import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../../../assets/styles/pages/main.css"; import "../../../assets/styles/pages/animate.css"; import "../../../assets/styles/pages/main-mob.css"; import portfolioImage from "../../../assets/images/portfolio.jpg"; export default class MainMobileComponent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { pageNum: "1", pageName: "Home", currentOpacityClass: "op-1" } } componentDidMount() { setTimeout(()=>{const wow = new window.WOW({ boxClass: 'wow', animateClass: 'animated' }); wow.init(); document.getElementById("intro").style.display= "block"; }, 1000); } openSideMenu(){ document.getElementById("side-menu").style.marginLeft = "0px"; document.getElementsByClassName("over-toggle")[0].style.display= "block"; document.getElementsByClassName("side-mob-black")[0].style.width="100%"; document.getElementsByClassName("line-s")[0].attributes("style","transform: rotate(45deg); transform-origin: left top; width: 15px; margin-top: 14px; margin-left: 0px;"); document.getElementsByClassName("line-l")[0].attributes("style","display: none; margin-top: 4px;"); document.getElementsByClassName("over-toggle")[0].addEventListener("click", function(){ document.getElementsByClassName("side-mob-black")[0].style.width="0%"; document.getElementById("side-menu").style.marginLeft = "-200px"; document.getElementsByClassName("over-toggle")[0].style.display= "none"; }) } render() { var { pageNum, pageName , currentOpacityClass} = this.state; var opacityClass = currentOpacityClass; if(pageNum != 1){ opacityClass="op-0"; } return (
